name: Fischschwarm
description:
Story:

You were separated from your swarm und try now to catch them up. On your Journey you have to avoid dangerous predator and other sea creatures to get safety back to your swarm.

  

Control:
  • You can control your player with W+A+S+D or with the arrow keys.
  • Shift for sprint.

  

It's my first Game I published. Please leave a short comment what you think about it. What's good and especially what's bad so I can learn and  improve myself.

The empty button in the menu will by the highscore in the future. I needed to remove the old system because it didn't worked anymore after I switched the Game to a WebGL project.
